goal.en: This course provides a comprehensive and through mathematical backgrounds for the undergraduate students majoring in Mechanical Engineering.
goal.ch: 教授機械工程學系學生所需、與機械工程課程相關之數學。

content.en:
(1) Partial Differential Equations
(2) Linear Algebra
(3) Vector Calculus
content.ch:
(1) Partial Differential Equations
(2) Linear Algebra
(3) Vector Calculus

textbook.en: Textbook: Advanced Engineering Mathematics TENTH EDITION: ERWIN KREYSZIG Dennis Zill and Michael Cullen, “Advanced Engineering Mathematics” Peter V. O’Neil, “Advanced Engineering Mathematics”
textbook.ch: Textbook: Advanced Engineering Mathematics TENTH EDITION: ERWIN KREYSZIG Dennis Zill and Michael Cullen, “Advanced Engineering Mathematics” Peter V. O’Neil, “Advanced Engineering Mathematics”

grading.en: Homework Assignments: 15% Class Participation & etc.: 5% exams: 80%
grading.ch: Homework Assignments: 15% Class Participation & etc.: 5% exams: 80%

en.competency: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation

en: Department:Department of Mechanical Engineering only.Year:Second Year only.Student ID:even numbers Only. Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementME2001 only.With an average of 40 or above for Required Subjects.

Department:Department of Mechanical Engineering only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementME2001 only.With an average of 40 or above for Required Subjects.
Department:Interdisciplinary Program of Engineering only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementME2001 only.With an average of 40 or above for Required Subjects.
ch: 系所:限機械工程學系。年級:限二年級。學號:限雙號。指定課程:必須先修ME2001。且檢定指定課程平均成績達40分以上。
系所:限機械工程學系。年級:限三年級、四年級。指定課程:必須先修ME2001。且檢定指定課程平均成績達40分以上。
系所:限工學院學士班。指定課程:必須先修ME2001。且檢定指定課程平均成績達40分以上。
